documentation.text:
@dev Base URI for computing {tokenURI}. Empty by default, can be overriden
 in child contracts.

@dev Base URI for computing {tokenURI}. Empty by default, can be overriden
 in child contracts.

params._tokenId: - the NFT asset queried for royalty information
params._value: - the sale price of the NFT asset specified by _tokenId

returns._receiver: - address of who should be sent the royalty payment
returns._royaltyAmount: - the royalty payment amount for value sale price
